home.baseline: With Amy, become the selfie master

about.message: Quod si rectum statuerimus vel concedere amicis, quidquid velint, vel impetrare ab iis, quidquid velimus, perfecta quidem sapientia si simus, nihil habeat res vitii; sed loquimur de iis amicis qui ante oculos sunt, quos vidimus aut de quibus memoriam accepimus, quos novit vita communis. Ex hoc numero nobis exempla sumenda sunt, et eorum quidem maxime qui ad sapientiam proxime accedunt.

acknowledgements.title: Acknowledgements

Ex hoc numero nobis exempla sumenda sunt, et eorum quidem maxime qui ad sapientiam proxime accedunt.

errors.outOfCamera: You are out of the range, place yourself in the center of the landmark.
errors.tooClose: You are too close to the camera, go back to place yourself in the center of the landmark.
errors.tooFar: You are too far to the camera, put yourself closer.

share.title: This is a share page
share.message: Hey ! Come create your perfect selfie on {appName}
share.subtitle: Share

email.title: Send by e-mail
email.success: The mail was sent with success to {emailAdress}, do not hesitate to check your mailbox
email.error: There was an error with the servor, please try again later.
